title: Ep. 441 - The Extraordinary Cowardice Of Left Wing Campus Protestors
description:
Today on the show, I'll talk about my experience at the University of Maryland last night. Leftists protested the talk and handed out pamphlets encouraging people to stay away. How has our university system turned students into such intellectual cowards? We'll discuss. Also, five headlines including the attempt by thousands of people to have Pornhub shut down. Are they in the right? And Andrew writes in to tell me why I'm wrong about my stance on gay marriage.

Check out The Cold War: What We Saw, a new podcast written and presented by Bill Whittle at https://www.dailywire.com/coldwar. In Part 1 we peel back the layers of mystery cloaking the Terror state run by the Kremlin, and watch as America takes its first small steps onto the stage of world leadership.

If you like The Matt Walsh Show, become a member TODAY with promo code: WALSH and enjoy the exclusive benefits for 10% off at https://www.dailywire.com/Walsh
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
